StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetParentOrgByChildId]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @ChildId int ) AS
SELECT [PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID], [NAME]
FROM [mcriss].[dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP] om Inner Join [mcriss].[dbo].[RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION] ro on ro.ORGANIZATION_ID = om.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE om.[CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID] = @ChildId
